import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import {Form, Button, Row, Col} from "react-bootstrap" import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux" import Message from "../components/Message" import Loader from "../components/Loader" import {login} from "../actions/userAction" import FormContainer from "../components/FormContainer" export default function LoginScreen( {location} ) { const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(login(email, password)) } // redirect to home page? not fully understand it yet... const redirect = location.search? location.search.split("=")[1]: "/" // all stuff inside is the children return (

Sign In

Email Address {setEmail(e.target.value)}}/> password {setPassword(e.target.value)}}/>
New Customer? Register ) }
